mkv17:2: tatra katamat karma yamalokopapattisaṁvartanīyam. ucyate. kruddhasya pratihatacittasya kāyavāṅmanoduścaritam. lobho viṣamalobho mithyājīvo jighāṁsitapipāsitasya kruddhasya kālakriyā. vastuṣv abhiṣaktacittasya kālakriyā.
mkv17:3: a) yathā coktaṁ bhagavatā śatavarge āgame karmavibhaṅgasūtre. tasya khalu punar ānanda pudgalasyānyajātikṛtaṁ vā karma pratyupasthitaṁ bhavati. maraṇakāle vā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ. idaṁ karma yamalokopapattisaṁvartanīyam.
